participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and caring, loves to learn and share knowledge.
participant_1.background: I like to read pet training blogs and websites. I am a librarian. I want to find a way to eat healthier that my boyfriend will enjoy too. I enjoy spending time with my pets, and I love to eat strawberries. I would like to try sky diving.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Creative and hardworking, enjoys being active and exploring new experiences.
participant_2.background: I get to be creative and have fun with my work. I am a hard worker who enjoys being active but struggles with weight loss. I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables. I stayed home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, for my birthday. I like to attend wine tours.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey how's it going?
Good! What do you do for a living?
I'm a graphic designer. I get to be creative and have fun with my work.
Wow that sounds really cool! Do you like it?
I do, it's a lot of fun! I get to work on a variety of projects, and I always get to be creative.
That's awesome! I'm a librarian, I love books!
I love books too! I read a lot of pet training blogs and websites. I have three cats and a dog.
That's so cute! I love animals. I would like to get a dog someday.
You should! They're the best companions.
I know, I've heard that. I'm just not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility.
I know what you mean. They're a lot of work, but they're worth it.
I'll have to think about it. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Leroy Jenkins. He's my best friend.
That's a great name!
Thanks! He's a stray cat that I found a few years ago.
Aww, that's so sweet. I'm glad you gave him a home.
Me too. He's the best.
I'm sure he is!
What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction and fantasy.
I love historical fiction too! I haven't read a lot of fantasy, but I've heard good things.
You should definitely give it a try! There are some great fantasy books out there.
I will! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Good! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
Thanks!
No problem
